title: Bug 49235: ServletContainerInitializer onStartup(Set<Class<? classSet is not expected class
description: Bug 49235: The ServletContainerInitializer onStartup(Set<Class<? classSet is not returning the expected class. The output is "MySomeClass".
OB: When running the code provided, the output is "MySomeAnn" instead of "MySomeClass".
EB: I expect the code to output "MySomeClass".
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Build Tomcat 7.0.0 from svn r939221.
2. Use the provided code:
   - Create a class named MySomeClass with the @MySomeAnn annotation.
   - Create a class named ModuleInitializer implementing the ServletContainerInitializer interface with the @HandlesTypes(MySomeAnn.class) annotation.
   - Implement the onStartup method with the provided code.
3. Run the code and observe the output. The output should be "MySomeClass" instead of "MySomeAnn".
